uploadForm.title: JSON Translation Tool
uploadForm.description: Upload a JSON file that can be automatically translated into Chinese. Please make sure to select a non nested JSON file. Before uploading, select the translation method, which defaults to translating English into Chinese.
uploadForm.loadingText: If it gets stuck on a value for a long time without making progress, please wait a bit longer instead of refreshing the page, as the upstream server might be overloaded and could recover in about one minute.
uploadForm.modelInfo: Translation is performed using either gpt-4o-mini or deepseek-chat, chosen randomly. Haven't heard of DeepSeek? It's similar to gpt-4o-mini but cheaper and faster.
uploadForm.mcInfo: Struggling with translating Java Edition Minecraft mods? Upload them here for automatic translation.
uploadForm.emailContact: For Bedrock Edition, you can contact via email h{'@'}lvjia.cc. We will develop one if there are enough requests.
uploadForm.privacyDesc: We only collect anonymous usage statistics, no personal information is included.
uploadForm.dntEnabled: Do Not Track is enabled, we will not collect any statistics.
uploadForm.dntEnabledPrevious: Do Not Track is enabled, although you previously agreed, now enabling DNT means we will not collect any statistics.
uploadForm.thankYou: Thank you for your support! Your ID is:
uploadForm.rateLimitError: Too many requests. Maximum 3 requests allowed per 10 seconds. Please try again later.
uploadForm.tutorialContent1: Download a compression software such as 7-zip, right-click the jar file to open or extract it. Locate the assets folder where the mod resources are stored.
uploadForm.tutorialContent2: Inside the assets folder, find another folder named something other than Minecraft; this contains the language files in json format.
uploadForm.tutorialContent3: Upload these json files to this website, save after translation, rename them to zh_cn.json, and place them back inside.
uploadForm.tutorialContent4: If you extracted the files, recompress them into a regular zip format ensuring that the root directory does not contain just a single folder. This should indicate successful compression; change the extension to .jar.
uploadForm.privacyModalContent: Simply put, we count real users and do not share this data with any third parties.
uploadForm.serverError: There was an unexpected error earlier, but it was resolved after restarting the server.

jsonError1: JSON must be an object, not an array or other type.
jsonError2: values must be strings, no nested objects or arrays are allowed
jsonError6: key-value pairs, which exceeds the limit of 1000 pairs
UserT: The user had agreed to it, but now has DNT turned on
